```{r}
aus_accommodation_long <- aus_accommodation |> 
  pivot_longer(cols = Takings:CPI, names_to="variable",
               values_to = "valor") |> 
  features(valor,
           list(media = mean,
                desv_std = sd,
                minimo = min,
                maximo = max,
                mediana = median)
           ) #|> 
  #pivot_wider(names_from = variable, values_from = media:mediana)
```
